title: Software Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 Digital Solution Engineering Manager
   

  

  

  

**Your role and responsibilities**
 In this role, We are looking for a highly skilled Sr Software Engineer with extensive experience in .NET and React to lead the development of cutting\\-edge software solutions for the Process Automation Industry. In this role, you will drive the technical strategy, define architectural best practices, and mentor engineering teams to build scalable and high\\-performance industrial automation systems. You will collaborate closely with cross functional stakeholders to align technical roadmaps with business objectives, ensuring innovation, reliability, and efficiency in mission\\-critical environments
   

  

 This role is contributing to Process Automation business for Process Automation Digital division based in Bangalore Southfield, India
   

  

 Your responsibilities:
   

  

* Define and implement scalable, high\\-performance software architectures using .NET (C\\#) and React/Redux
* Provide technical direction and mentorship to development teams, ensuring adherence to best coding and design practices.
* Architect and optimize microservices\\-based solutions, ensuring modularity, performance, and maintainability. Drive innovation by identifying and implementing AI\\-powered automation tools for software development and testing.
* Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code, following SOLID principles. Design and develop applications that integrate with industrial automation systems (SCADA, MES, OPC UA, PLCs, IoT platforms).
* Ensure seamless real\\-time data processing and communication between IT and OT systems. Define standards for system reliability, fault tolerance, and high availability in mission\\-critical industrial environments
* Actively participate in Agile (Scrum/Kanban) sprints, ensuring timely delivery of features. Ensure frontend and backend integration through well\\-structured RESTful APIs and WebSocket's


**Qualifications for the role**
 Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field.
   

  

 7\\+ years of extensive experience in .NET and Angular to lead the development of cutting\\-edge software solutions for the Process Automation Industry.
   

  

 Technical Skills:
   

  

* Backend: .NET Core, C\\#, ASP.NET, Web APIs, Entity Framework \\& Frontend: React JS, TypeScript, RxJS, NgRx
* Database: SQL Server, PostgreSQL, or NoSQL databases \\& Cloud \\& DevOps: Azure/AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD Pipelines
* Automation \\& Industrial Protocols: OPC UA, MQTT, SCADA, MES \\& Testing \\& Security: Unit testing, security bestpractices, OWASP
* Good knowledge of containerization using K8s / K3s / Docker \\& Experience of working with virtual environments(Vmware / Hyperview / Azure)


**More about us**
 ABB a provides a comprehensive range of integrated automation, electrical and digital systems and services for customers in the process, hybrid and maritime industries. These offerings, coupled with deep domain knowledge in each end market, help to optimize productivity, energy efficiency, sustainability and safety of industrial processes and operations.
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Software QA Engineer 1
description:
**Overview**
 Keysight is at the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our \\~15,000 employees create world\\-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.
   

  

 Our award\\-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry\\-first solutions. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 At Keysight Technologies, we are seeking a detail\\-oriented Software QA Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for testing our PCIe protocol analyser and exerciser products through both manual and automated testing methods to ensure the highest quality standards. You will work closely with R\\&D Project Manager, Product Architects, Solution Teams, FPGA and Software Engineers to develop new product offerings and improve existing ones.
   

  

 If you are passionate about pushing the boundaries of technology and thrive in a collaborative and fast\\-paced environment, we invite you to join our team and contribute to the advancement of PCIe solutions.
   

  

 The candidate will work closely with teams in Germany and US and coordinate with partners who provide R\\&D resources necessary for executing the project.
   

  

**Qualifications**
**Education:**
* Electronics/ Electrical /Computer Science Engineering or closely related field


**Essential**
* Proven experience of 0 to 4 years in software quality assurance, with a focus on electronics measurement instruments
* Design, develop, and maintain automated test for protocol analysers and exercisers using C\\# \\& python.
* Candidate should possess a solid understanding of electronics concepts.
* Solid understanding of manual testing principles and methodologies.
* Excellent analytical and problem\\-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail.
* Ability to work effectively in a fast\\-paced, dynamic environment with tight deadlines.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-functional teams.
* Proactive attitude towards learning and self\\-improvement, with a passion for software quality and customer satisfaction.


**Preferred**
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines.
* Familiarity with Microsoft Visual Studio
* Familiarity with Git source control
* Familiarity with Atlassian tools – Confluence, Jira, Bitbucket


 Careers Privacy Statement\\*\\*\\*Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.\\*\\*\\*

title: Data Engineer
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 1 May 2025
   

  

**Title**
 Data Engineer
   

  

**Job Description**
 A Data Engineer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining large\\-scale data systems and infrastructure. Their primary goal is to ensure that data is properly collected, stored, processed, and retrieved to support business intelligence, analytics, and data\\-driven decision\\-making.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and Develop Data Pipelines: Create data pipelines to extract data from various sources, transform it into a standardized format, and load it into a centralized data repository.
* Build and Maintain Data Infrastructure: Design, implement, and manage data warehouses, data lakes, and other data storage solutions.
* Ensure Data Quality and Integrity: Develop data validation, cleansing, and normalization processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
* Collaborate with Data Analysts and Business Process Owners: Work with data analysts and business process owners to understand their data requirements and provide data support for their projects.
* Optimize Data Systems for Performance: Continuously monitor and optimize data systems for performance, scalability, and reliability.
* Develop and Maintain Data Governance Policies: Create and enforce data governance policies to ensure data security, compliance, and regulatory requirements.


**Experience \\& Skills**
* Hands\\-on experience in implementing, supporting, and administering modern cloud\\-based data solutions (Google BigQuery, AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, Snowflake, etc.).
* Strong programming skills in SQL, Java, and Python.
* Experience in configuring and managing data pipelines using Apache Airflow, Informatica, Talend, SAP BODS or API\\-based extraction.
* Expertise in real\\-time data processing frameworks.
* Strong understanding of Git and CI/CD for automated deployment and version control.
* Experience with Infrastructure\\-as\\-Code tools like Terraform for cloud resource management.
* Good stakeholder management skills to collaborate effectively across teams.
* Solid understanding of SAP ERP data and processes to integrate enterprise data sources.
* Exposure to data visualization and front\\-end tools (Tableau, Looker, etc.).
* Strong command of English with excellent communication skills.

title: R&D Engineer 6, Software
description:
****Overview****
 Keysight is at the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our \\~15,000 employees create world\\-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.
   

  

 Our award\\-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry\\-first solutions. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.
   

  

 Technical Leadership in Cutting\\-Edge Product Development
   

  

**Overview**
 As a Principal Software Engineer, you will play an essential role in shaping the
   

  

 technical direction of products designed for testing cutting\\-edge ultra\\-high speed
   

  

 networks and AI Data Centres. Your expertise will be pivotal in steering the team

 You will be a technical champion for the team and a consultant to senior
   

  

 management. Additionally, as a key member of the engineering team, you will be
   

  

 involved in all aspects of product development, including architecture, design,
   

  

 development, testing, and customer support.
   

  

****Responsibilities****
 The successful candidate will be responsible for and hence should be able to
   

  

**Demonstrate Proficiency In Most Of The Following:**
  Architectural Expertise: Leading the definition and evaluation of architecture
   

  

 for new and existing products, while assessing the customer and business
   

  

 impacts of design and technical decisions.
   

  

  Software Development and Problem Solving: Demonstrating strong
   

  

 software development and debugging skills. Solving complex problems using
   

  

 expertise in algorithms and data structures, and understanding and working
   

  

 with large codebases is essential.
   

  

  Automation and Modern Software Development Workflow: Embracing
   

  

 scripting languages such as shell script, Perl, or Python to automate everyday
   

  

 tasks. Proven ability in Agile, Test Driven Development, API first approach, and
   

  

 DevOps workflows.
   

  

  Communication and Collaboration: Possessing strong verbal and written
   

  

 communication skills, an open mind, and a readiness to learn. Working
   

  

 effectively both individually and as part of a team to achieve project goals with
   

  

 minimal guidance. Showcasing flexibility and openness to build strong
   

  

 customer engagements at senior technical levels.
   

  

  Continuous Learning: Showing a keen interest in technology, with the ability
   

  

 to communicate effectively with opinionated technologists across the company
   

  

 in emerging areas. Demonstrating readiness to learn on the fly and pick\\-up
   

  

**New Technology Skills As Required.**
  Emerging Technologies and Industry Trends Leadership: Staying abreast
   

  

 of the latest advancements in technology and understanding how they can be
   

  

 leveraged to drive innovation and efficiency within the organization.
   

  

****Qualifications****
 Skillset Requirements
   

  

  Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science \\& Engineering,
   

  

 Information Technology, or a related field; MS in related field preferred.
   

  

  8\\+ years of experience in product development with exposure to complete
   

  

 product development cycle.
   

  

  Strong software development skills. Should be proficient in C/C\\+\\+/ Python
   

  

 programming \\& debugging in Linux environment.
   

  

  Understanding of Kubernetes, Containers, Cloud environments is expected.
   

  

  Networking Expertise: Preference to be given to candidates demonstrating
   

  

 strong programming and domain knowledge in high performance network and
   

  

 socket programming, protocol knowledge across L27 stack. Like TCP/IP, HTTP,
   

  

 QUIC, Routing, switching protocols
   

  

 Careers Privacy Statement\\*\\*\\*Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.\\*\\*\\*

title: AI Agent Workflow Developer
description:
**Company Description**

 Octobit8 is a dynamic software solutions firm specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Infrastructure, and Cybersecurity. Established in 2021, the company has successfully delivered over 300 projects across nine diverse industries. Octobit8 empowers enterprises to innovate and transform their businesses by developing secure, scalable, and intelligent digital platforms. From conceptualization to cloud\\-native production, Octobit8 ensures the delivery of enterprise\\-grade software solutions tailored to client needs.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time hybrid role based in Noida, allowing a combination of on\\-site work and remote flexibility. As an AI Agent Workflow Developer, you will design, build, test, and optimize AI\\-driven workflows to enhance automation and operational efficiency. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate AI models, tune algorithms, and refine machine learning workflows to drive business objectives. Additionally, you will monitor performance metrics, document processes, and stay updated on emerging AI trends to apply them effectively in innovative projects.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning frameworks, and algorithm optimization
* Experience with workflow automation, process design, and deployment strategies
* Advanced programming skills in Python, R, or similar tools for AI development
* Knowledge of Cloud Infrastructure and platforms, such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
* Strong problem\\-solving, critical thinking, and troubleshooting abilities
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills for cross\\-functional teamwork
* Familiarity with cybersecurity principles for safeguarding AI systems is a plus
* Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field

title: Senior C++ Software Developer with Linux - Risk Engine Integration (NP within 60 days only accepted, Hybrid or WFH)
description:
**Project Description:** 




 The Risk Engine Engineer role is in the counterparty credit risk (CCR) modelling and analytics team within R\\&C model development group. The candidate is joining our global team for the counterparty credit risk modelling covering all assets classes, and in particular, for FX and interest rate derivatives.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




 • New platform integration into existing risk and pricing systems.
 



 • Develop APIs and adapters for internal applications and data flows.
 



 • Implement and optimize risk calculations.
 



 • Ensure scalability and performance for large portfolios.
 



 • Build automated testing frameworks for model validation.
 



 • Collaborate with quantitative analysts and risk managers to align requirements.
 



  





**Mandatory Skills Description:** 




 • Strong C\\+\\+ expertise (C\\+\\+11/14/17 or later), STL, Boost.
 



 • Strong expertise with Linux and Bash Shell.
 



 • Experience with Risk models such as ADCO, QuantLib, ORE etc.
 



 • Expertise in Python programming, including scripting, data manipulation, and familiarity with relevant libraries (e.g., NumPy, SciPy, Pandas for scientific computing, or specific frameworks depending on the domain)
 



 • Experience in using SWIG to generate Python bindings for C\\+\\+ libraries.
 



 • Familiarity with Git, CMake, and build systems.
 



 • Integration experience with APIs, messaging systems, and databases.
 



 • Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, or related field.
 



  





**Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills Description:** 




 • Cloud deployment experience (AWS, Azure).
 



 • Knowledge of Adjoint Algorithmic Differentiation (AAD).
 



 • Prior experience in banking or financial risk systems.

title: Sr UI Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Best Infosystems Ltd. is a leading technology solutions provider dedicated to delivering innovative software products and services to clients across various industries. With a strong reputation for excellence and a commitment to quality, the company specializes in custom software development, enterprise solutions, and digital transformation initiatives. Our team comprises talented professionals who are passionate about leveraging the latest technologies to solve complex business challenges. At Best Infosystems Ltd., we foster an inclusive and collaborative work environment that encourages continuous learning and growth, making us a preferred employer in the tech industry.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior UI Developer to join our dynamic team. This is a full\\-time remote position based in Tamil Nadu, Bangalore, or Trivandrum, with the flexibility to work from home most days. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in front\\-end development, particularly with Vue.js, and will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining user interfaces for our cutting\\-edge web applications. The Senior UI Developer will collaborate closely with backend developers, designers, and product managers to create seamless and engaging user experiences that meet business objectives and exceed user expectations.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a minimum of 4 to 6 years of professional experience in front\\-end development, with a proven track record of working with Vue.js frameworks. A bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is preferred. Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS is essential. Candidates should demonstrate excellent problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team. Familiarity with modern development tools, version control systems, and agile methodologies will be advantageous. Knowledge of Nuxt3, TailwindCSS, and unit testing frameworks like Vitest will be considered a plus.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable and efficient user interfaces using Vue.js (Vue3/Vue2\\) to ensure optimal performance and usability.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including backend developers, UX/UI designers, and product managers to translate business requirements into technical specifications and functional features.
* Implement responsive designs that provide a seamless experience across various devices and screen sizes.
* Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code, adhering to best practices and coding standards.
* Conduct code reviews and participate in team discussions to promote code quality and knowledge sharing.
* Utilize modern tools and frameworks such as Nuxt3 and TailwindCSS to enhance development efficiency and UI aesthetics.
* Develop and execute unit tests using Vitest to ensure code reliability and facilitate continuous integration.
* Stay updated with the latest industry trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve development processes and product quality.
* Assist in troubleshooting and resolving UI\\-related issues in a timely manner to ensure a smooth user experience.


**Benefits**
 At Best Infosystems Ltd., we offer a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees' well\\-being and professional growth. This includes competitive salary packages, flexible working hours, and the option to work remotely with minimal office visits. Employees are also entitled to health insurance coverage, paid leave, and opportunities for training and skill development. We foster a positive work environment that encourages innovation, collaboration, and recognition. Additionally, employees have access to various wellness programs and employee engagement initiatives aimed at promoting a healthy work\\-life balance.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Best Infosystems Ltd. is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of race, gender, age, religion, national origin, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that a diverse workforce enhances our ability to innovate and deliver exceptional solutions to our clients. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to any protected status.

title: Azure Data Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Xebia is a leading global consultancy specializing in digital transformation, agile methodologies, and innovative technology solutions. With a strong presence across multiple countries, Xebia is committed to helping organizations achieve their digital goals through cutting\\-edge consulting, engineering, and training services. The company prides itself on fostering a collaborative and inclusive work environment that encourages continuous learning and professional growth. Xebia’s expertise spans various domains including cloud computing, data engineering, DevOps, and software development, making it a trusted partner for businesses seeking to leverage technology for competitive advantage.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled Azure Data Engineer to join our dynamic team at Xebia in Bengaluru. The ideal candidate will have extensive hands\\-on experience working within the Azure Data ecosystem, including Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Lake, and Azure Databricks. This role involves designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and efficient data pipelines and analytics solutions that support business intelligence and data\\-driven decision\\-making. The Azure Data Engineer will collaborate closely with data architects, analysts, and business stakeholders to ensure the delivery of high\\-quality data solutions that meet organizational needs. The position offers an exciting opportunity to work on innovative projects utilizing the latest Azure technologies, contributing to the digital transformation initiatives of our clients.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a minimum of 6\\-10 years of experience in data engineering or related fields, with a strong focus on cloud\\-based data solutions. A bachelor’s or master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related discipline is preferred. Proven expertise in Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Lake, and Azure Databricks is essential. The candidate should have solid knowledge of data warehousing concepts, SQL performance tuning, and query optimization. Familiarity with Azure Synapse Analytics, CI/CD pipelines, Git, and Azure DevOps will be advantageous. Strong problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative environment are critical for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain end\\-to\\-end data pipelines utilizing Azure Data Factory to facilitate seamless data ingestion, transformation, and orchestration workflows.
* Implement robust data ingestion strategies and transformation processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency across systems.
* Work extensively with Azure Data Lake to manage structured and unstructured data, ensuring efficient storage and retrieval.
* Build and optimize data processing solutions using Azure Databricks, leveraging PySpark for scalable data analytics.
* Ensure high data quality, reliability, and performance of all data pipelines through rigorous testing and validation.
* Collaborate with data architects, analysts, and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
* Optimize costs, performance, and security of Azure data services by implementing best practices and monitoring resource utilization.
* Implement CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and Git, following DevOps best practices to streamline deployment and updates.
* Troubleshoot and resolve production issues promptly, providing performance tuning and system enhancements as needed.


**Benefits**
 Xebia offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support the well\\-being and professional growth of our employees. Employees are entitled to competitive salary packages, performance\\-based incentives, and health insurance coverage. We promote work\\-life balance through flexible working hours and remote work options. Continuous learning is encouraged through access to training programs, certifications, and industry conferences. Our inclusive work environment fosters diversity and equal opportunity, ensuring every team member is valued and empowered to succeed. Additionally, employees have access to mentorship programs, career development workshops, and a collaborative culture that promotes innovation and creativity.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Xebia is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and applicants regardless of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. We believe that diversity enhances our ability to innovate and serve our clients effectively and are dedicated to fostering a workplace that respects and values individual differences.

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 7 December 2025
   

  

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital – OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Master’s degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.

title: Product Manager
description:
**Company:** 
 Tilda.bio
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Experience:** 
 1–3 years Product Management \\+ 1–2 years prior Software Engineering experience
